channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: Cathie Wood 说，随着技术供应链的复苏，半导体股票可能会经历市场调整
item.description:
Cathie Wood says semiconductor stocks may endure a market correction as the supply chain for the technology perks up https://t.co/RSdd81AItp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: Napier Park Global Capital 首席投资官乔纳森-多夫曼（Jonathan Dorfman）表示，自 2008 年金融危机以来，投资者首次可以组建能够产生类似股票回报的信贷投资组合。
item.description:
For the first time since the 2008 financial crisis, investors can assemble credit portfolios capable of producing equity-like returns, according to Jonathan Dorfman, chief investment officer at Napier Park Global Capital. https://t.co/Ih7acAjLKJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 与路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）政府结盟的巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）董事会成员周四否决了市场预期的支付特别股息的提议。
item.description:
Petrobras board members aligned with the government of Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva shot down a proposal Thursday to pay special dividends the market was expecting https://t.co/YQiV3ZIHdr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拉米雷斯又从花旗集团聘请了三名银行家和一名分析师，这是最新的一批增聘人员
item.description:
Ramirez has hired three more bankers and an analyst from Citigroup, the latest in a number of additions https://t.co/HJrSvvLXfv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）说，美联储对利率中性设定的估计偏离了预期，决策者今年最终不下调基准利率的可能性越来越大。
item.description:
Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers said that the Fed is well off on its estimate of a neutral setting for interest rates, and that there’s an increasing chance that policymakers don’t end up lowering their benchmark this year. https://t.co/E7NiHqka26

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，随着通胀进一步降温，他预计决策者今年将降低利率。
item.description:
Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said he expects policymakers will lower interest rates this year as inflation cools further. https://t.co/gFRf7Oq7rs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 奇货通讯：是时候讨论宽松的金融条件了
item.description:
Odd Lots Newsletter: It’s Time to Talk About Looser Financial Conditions https://t.co/e91IpedKhC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在期权市场上，比特币达到 100,000 美元的预测开始变得现实可行
item.description:
Bitcoin-at-$100,000 predictions are beginning to look like a realistic possibility in the options market https://t.co/UezOqd6wNx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 世界上两个最臭名昭著的勒索软件团伙正在内讧，留下了备受瞩目的受害者，并在网络犯罪世界造成了混乱
item.description:
Two of the most notorious ransomware gangs in the world are imploding, leaving high-profile victims in their wake and creating chaos in the cybercriminal underworld https://t.co/7YPQt4ZcML

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国 2 月份失业率攀升至两年来的新高，尽管招聘情况依然健康，这表明劳动力市场趋冷但仍有韧性。
item.description:
The US jobless rate climbed to a two-year high in February even as hiring remained healthy, pointing to a cooler yet resilient labor market https://t.co/0hztmdlQZk pic.twitter.com/VqLin2lQcN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: TPG 正在讨论收购合作伙伴集团旗下的 Techem 公司
item.description:
TPG in Discussions to Acquire Partners Group’s Techem https://t.co/c9E2HjbUu3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 即使美元遭遇今年最严重的暴跌，华尔街仍未准备好全力押注看跌美元
item.description:
Wall Street isn’t ready to go all in on bearish dollar bets even as the currency suffers from the worst selloff this year https://t.co/39bZJeCSw7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国 2 月份的就业率攀升至两年来的新高。对于失业者来说，这是一个挫折，但这并不预示着劳动力市场的末日来临。
item.description:
The US employment rate climbed to a two-year high in February. It’s a setback for those who lost their jobs, but it hardly signaled doom and gloom in the labor market https://t.co/CfGeuVyj2z

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在与捷蓝航空合并失败后，Spirit 时间紧迫，别无选择，只能向债务人寻求救命稻草。他们希望得到很多回报
item.description:
Short on time and running out of options after its scuttled merger with JetBlue, Spirit is left looking to debtholders for a lifeline. They will want a lot in return https://t.co/x1hMCreR5b

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 英国央行自己的一位研究人员认为，英国央行和美联储在开始放松量化宽松政策之前加息是错误的
item.description:
The Bank of England and the Fed were wrong to raise interest rates before starting to unwind quantitative easing, according to one of the BOE’s own researchers https://t.co/60gedEvjZy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 英国前首相特雷莎-梅今天宣布她将不参加下届大选，她是做出这一决定的众多政治家之一。下一届议会将是什么样子？与 @h_chandlerwilde 一起来了解详情。
item.description:
Former UK Prime Minister Theresa May announced today that she will not stand in the next election, one of many politicians to make the decision. What will the next Parliament look like? Get The Readout with @h_chandlerwilde https://t.co/E619qGW1ln

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 阿伯克龙比股价大涨的势头正在减弱
item.description:
A blistering rally in Abercrombie shares is losing steam https://t.co/YRie2nvTxx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在能量饮料制造商 Celsius Holdings 于过去五个交易日中的四个交易日创下收盘纪录新高后，看跌该公司的投资者正在舔舐伤口。
item.description:
Investors making bearish wagers against Celsius Holdings are licking their wounds after the energy drink maker set record closing highs in four of the past five sessions https://t.co/Zblz6qc6t4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: EQT 对欧洲资本市场的现状感到非常沮丧，因此正在探索建立一种结构，使其能够更长期地持有某些资产。
item.description:
EQT is so frustrated with the state of capital markets in Europe that it’s exploring the creation of structures that would allow it to hold certain assets for longer https://t.co/iWTAh3Y2YL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 上个月，公共部门就业人数的增长超过了加拿大企业就业人数的减少，这凸显出劳动力市场受到了政府招聘的支撑。
item.description:
Employment gains in the public sector more than offset losses among Canadian businesses last month, highlighting a labor market that has been propped up by government hiring. https://t.co/5FnpLcu1T9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 与美国其他地区相比，最有可能决定 2024 年总统大选的七个摇摆州面临着更大的经济困难，这为乔-拜登总统的连任竞选增添了障碍。
item.description:
The seven swing states most likely to decide the 2024 presidential election have been facing more economic misery than the rest of the US, adding an obstacle to President Joe Biden’s reelection campaign. https://t.co/CNL09E5eCq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，英国与印度之间的最新一轮贸易谈判似乎将在主要悬而未决问题上未取得突破的情况下结束
item.description:
The latest round of trade talks between the UK and India appears set to end without a breakthrough on major outstanding issues, sources say https://t.co/oW5VoYP4Li

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 欧元兑美元创下今年最佳一周汇率
item.description:
The euro is having its best week of the year against the dollar https://t.co/mQtoJpzJdy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

Lightspeed Hires Elliott’s Isaac Kim in Technology Buyouts Push https://t.co/VPck6RpMBC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: -美联储在创造 27.5 万个就业岗位的背景下处于有利位置-2024 年可能降息四次-市场变得更加大胆@ManusCranny 报道。敬请收听东部时间凌晨 5 点的 "彭博简报
item.description:
-The Fed is in an awesome place on the back of 275,000 jobs created
-Four potential rate cuts in 2024
-The market becomes more emboldened@ManusCranny reports. Tune into "Bloomberg Brief" at 5am ET https://t.co/cjSOuQW7kn pic.twitter.com/pYhm3JqVem

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.description:
Momentum builds for a June ECB rate cut https://t.co/rSysmY2lq6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 贝莱德表示，它将收购资产管理和技术公司 SpiderRock Advisors，以扩大面向富裕客户的定制投资策略。
item.description:
BlackRock said it’s acquiring SpiderRock Advisors, an asset-management and technology firm, to expand its customized investing strategies to wealthy clients. https://t.co/jmcGwDT6sQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 今年 5 月 14 日至 16 日，各国首脑、首席执行官和全球投资者将在多哈参加由 @BloombergLive 提供支持的第四届 @QatarEconForum 年度会议。#卡塔尔经济论坛#منتدى_قطر_الاقتصاديRegister 这里
item.description:
This May 14-16th Heads of States, CEOs, and global investors join us in Doha for the fourth annual @QatarEconForum, Powered by @BloombergLive. #QatarEconomicForum #منتدى_قطر_الاقتصادي

Register herehttps://t.co/mdAdeOuzHT pic.twitter.com/VQPJmbi2Fr

— Bloomberg Middle East (@middleeast) March 8, 2024

item.title: 世界贸易组织称，由于有迹象表明汽车行业的增长正在放缓，全球商品贸易正努力从去年的低迷中加速增长
item.description:
Global merchandise trade is struggling to accelerate from a slump last year amid signs that growth in the automotive industry is softening, the World Trade Organization says https://t.co/NYiRdBA4jd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024

item.title: 两年多来，Coinbase 终于首次回升到其直接上市价格之上
item.description:
Coinbase has finally climbed back above its direct listing price for the first time in more than two years https://t.co/xOy0LNLrY9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 8, 2024
